electionExtended: Election extended successfully. Notifications being sent to voters.
startMustBeFuture: Start date must be in the future
endMustBeAfterStart: End date must be after start date
invalidDuration: Election duration must be between 6 hours and 7 days
notActive: Election must be ACTIVE to extend
newEndMustBeAfterCurrent: New end date must be after current end date
extensionExceedsMax: Extension cannot exceed 24 hours from current end date
